Menu

Product Page

The product page provides all the details about a specified product. From here users can add the product to their cart for purchase.

Product Page Example

Anders

With a generously rounded browline and flattering medium fit, Anders is a surefire crowd-pleaser.

Frame Fit

Medium

Measurements

48-20-145

$95 including prescription lenses

Our Promise

Free shipping and returns, always.

We have a 30-day, no-questions-asked return policy for all our frames as well as a one-year, no-scratch guarantee for our lenses; we’ll replace your scratched lenses for free within the first 12 months.

Nothing but the best

  • Made from custom cellulose acetate and stainless steel
  • Cut from a single sheet of acetate to maintain color parity
  • Offer 100% UV protection
  • Akulon-coated screws for durability
  • Lenses made from polycarbonate, the most impact-resistant material for eyeglasses
  • Anti-scratch and anti-reflective coating included

</section>

  <div class="content-block__content-centered">

  </div>
</section>
